skills.name: Chilling Lament
skills.desc: Deals minor Ice DMG to a single target. Deals extra Ice DMG to the target if the target is currently Frozen and this unit is in the Freezing Point state.

skills.name: Frosty Absorption
skills.desc: Enters the Freezing Point state. Everwinter Rain can be used in subsequent attacks.

skills.name: Everwinter Rain
skills.desc: This ability is only available while in the Freezing Point state. Deals minor Ice DMG to all targets, with a chance to Freeze the targets.

skills.name: Chilling Lament
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG to a single target. There is a chance to Freeze the target if the user is in the Freezing Point state.
